mapper.select: SELECT u.username as userName, u.sex as sex, u.cell_phone_num as phone, u.id_card as idCard, u.bank_confirm as bankConfirm, u.locked as locked FROM app_user u WHERE u.username LIKE CONCAT(#{keyWord},'%') OR u.cell_phone_num LIKE CONCAT(#{keyWord},'%')
mapper.update: update app_user u set u.locked=1 where u.id=#{id}
